metadata.name: The Game Overture
metadata.description:
"The Game Overture" portrays the opening ceremony of Fatal Game 22, the biggest and most controversial sport event of the year.

Part of the "Fatal Game 22" collection, it aims at tearing the glittering veil wrapped around big events, giving the viewer a sneak peak of the controversy surrounding the entertainment industry.  
And what better occasion than our beloved World Cup, which certainly did not fall short in providing topics and themes for this collection?

Enter a crazily paced audio/visual world populated by fans celebrating, workers rioting, business men money-showering, love orgies, rainbow flags and, most and for all, death.  
Come and grab your deadly trophy!

"For the game, for the world"

Yours truly,

neer human

attributes.value: Neve Custom vintage desk 1975, Ableton Live, Pro Tools
EMS Synthi AKS, Mini Moog, Prophet 5
